content.query:
SELECT 
    YEAR(order_purchase_timestamp) AS current_year,
    COUNT(*) AS orders_per_year
FROM
   OPENROWSET(
        BULK'https://caseoliststorageaccount2.dfs.core.windows.net/processing/orders.parquet/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [orders_year_pool]
GROUP BY YEAR(order_purchase_timestamp)
ORDER BY 1 DESC
